alert.note: Alert for Adair; Linn; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 12:59PM CDT until July 29 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Adair County in northeastern Missouri... Northern Linn County in north central Missouri... Sullivan County in north central Missouri... Southern Putnam County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Schuyler County in northeastern Missouri... Northern Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1259 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles north of Milan to near Bucklin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kirksville, Milan, La Plata, Green City, Queen City, Novinger, Greentop, Greencastle, Brashear, Browning, Purdin, Newtown, Gibbs, Millard, Pollock, Worthington, Elmer, Harris, South Gifford and Reger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Adair; Linn; Macon; Putnam; Schuyler; Sullivan
